entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Mont-Tremblant
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Jovite 04:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -13.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %

Dewpoint: -15.0°C

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to freezing rain this evening then to rain after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 3 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of light snow near noon and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
